rows.label: qev090401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Are you the one they've paired me with?
Hmm. You have the look, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0004
rows.name: But what about inside?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0004_2_m
rows.name:
Does your heart burn with a flame
hot enough to forge a true BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0004_2_f
rows.name:
Does your heart burn with a flame
hot enough to forge a true BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev000904_JNK0010
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev000904_SEL0011
rows.name: Squint your eyes and nod grimly.

rows.label: qev000904_JNK0020
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev000904_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell him that he has no right to question your heart.

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Yes! Your eyes tell a thousand tales
that no words could match![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0006
rows.name:
Finally, the fates have delivered to me
a partner worthy of my trust.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0007
rows.name: Ha! That answer alone proves that your flame burns white-hot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0008
rows.name:
It's that sort of fearless ferocity that tempers
a soul into something heroic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0009
rows.name: Forgive me. I am Bozé Lowes, proud member of the Harriers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0010
rows.name: I will be your partner on this job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0011
rows.name: But please, call me Sensei.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0012
rows.name: Do you know this term?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0012_2
rows.name:
It's what some Eastern cultures used to call
teachers and wise men back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev000904_JNK0030
rows.name: Press

rows.label: qev000904_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Bozé to tell you more about these Eastern cultures.

rows.label: qev000904_JNK0040
rows.name: Move On

rows.label: qev000904_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ignore Bozé's prattle and direct
him back to the mission.

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0013
rows.name: Ah! A kindred spirit, I see![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0014
rows.name:
I used to travel in such places collecting antiquities.
Buddha carvings and the like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0015
rows.name:
Oh, and bonsai trees! Just looking at them is enough
to soothe the most wounded of souls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0016
rows.name: Pray tell, what is it about the East that draws your—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0017
rows.name: No! Belay that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0018
rows.name:
If we start down this path, we'll be talking until dawn.
Let us focus on the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0019
rows.name: Very well. I have the brief right here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0020
rows.name:
A few days ago, a group of BLADEs left the city
to hunt some indigens,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0021
rows.name: and they've not been heard from since.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0022
rows.name: Our job is to track them down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0023
rows.name:
If we also happen to take care of the indigens along the way,
so much the better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0024_m
rows.name: Rest easy, my friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0024_f
rows.name: Rest easy, my friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0025
rows.name: Sensei will show you what it means to be a true Harrier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090401_MSG0026
rows.name: The day is young, and victory is in the air. We ride![ST:wait ]
